name: Terrestrial Sling
description:
Made for mini game jam 123

It's not quite in a state I'm happy with.

Shoot out webs with your left mouse button and sling around.

Kill the karps for some reason.

Problems:

Death is too sudden. I should probably add an animation for this. I tried adding a mechanic where you can still save yourself when falling in the water, but didn't have enough time to implement it.

Needs more diverse enemies.

Needs more of incentive to use the main mechanic. I had some ideas for enemies that could give this, but didn't have enough time to implement.

Needs a plot.
